name: Minimalist Chair
description: A very comfortable and stylish chair for your modern living room. Made from high quality wood and fabric.

name: Modern Table Lamp
description: Brighten up your workspace with this sleek and modern table lamp. Features adjustable brightness.

name: Wooden Coffee Table
description: A centerpiece for your living area. Solid oak wood with a smooth finish.

name: Aura Smart Lamp
description: A smart lamp with a minimalist design, perfect for any bedside table. Controllable via app with multiple color modes.

name: Elegance Marble Lamp
description: Add a touch of luxury to your space with this elegant lamp, featuring a marble base and gold accents.

name: Nordic Dining Table
description: A simple yet beautiful dining table with a Nordic design, suitable for 4-6 people. Perfect for family meals.

name: Prestige Marble Table
description: Make a statement with this prestige dining table, featuring a stunning marble top and a unique metallic base.

name: ComfortMax Recliner
description: The ultimate relaxation chair. This recliner offers maximum comfort with its plush cushioning and easy-to-use reclining mechanism.

name: Velvet Accent Chair
description: A stylish accent chair upholstered in rich green velvet. Adds a pop of color and sophistication to any room.
